text: Kathy Bates (born Kathleen Doyle Bates, June 28, 1948) is an American actress and director. She was born in Memphis, Tennessee. Bates has starred in many movies, most notably Misery, Fried Green Tomatoes, Titanic and Richard Jewell. Bates had ovarian cancer in 2003 and breast cancer in 2012. Bates is also known for her multiple roles on American Horror Story. She also played Jo Bennett in the American sitcom The Office. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Memphis, Tennessee Category:American movie actors Category:American movie directors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American television directors Category:American voice actors
title: Kathy Bates
